verses.verse: הַדָּבָר֙ <S%H1697><s%> The word אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> that הָיָ֣ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <S%H3414><s%> that came to Jeremiah אֶ֚ל <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיְּהוּדִ֔ים <S%H3064><s%> concerning all the Jews הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <S%H3427><s%> which dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt הַיֹּשְׁבִ֤ים <S%H3427><s%> which dwell בְּמִגְדֹּל֙ <S%H4024><s%> at Migdol וּבְתַחְפַּנְחֵ֣ס <S%H8471><s%> and at Tahpanhes וּבְנֹ֔ף <S%H5297><s%> and at Noph וּבְאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> and in the country פַּתְר֖וֹס <S%H6624><s%> of Pathros לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying ס

כֹּה־ <S%H3541><s%> Thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you רְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> Ye have seen אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָֽרָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> all the evil אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> i הֵבֵ֙אתִי֙ <S%H935><s%> that I have brought עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> upon Jerusalem וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> and upon all the cities יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְהִנָּ֤ם <S%H2005><s%> are in חָרְבָּה֙ <S%H2723><s%> they [are] a desolation הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and behold this day הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְאֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and no בָּהֶ֖ם יוֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> and no man dwelleth

מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> Because רָעָתָ֗ם <S%H7451><s%> of their wickedness אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> which they have committed לְהַכְעִסֵ֔נִי <S%H3707><s%> to provoke me to anger לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> continuing לְקַטֵּ֔ר <S%H6999><s%> to burn incense לַעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> [and] to serve לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> other אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יְדָע֔וּם <S%H3045><s%> whom they knew הֵ֖מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you וַאֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> not [neither] they ye nor your fathers

וָאֶשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> Howbeit I sent אֲלֵיכֶם֙ <S%H413><s%> about אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדַ֣י <S%H5650><s%> unto you all my servants הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <S%H5030><s%> the prophets הַשְׁכֵּ֥ים <S%H7925><s%> rising early וְשָׁלֹ֖חַ <S%H7971><s%> and sending לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> [them] saying אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> Oh תַעֲשׂ֗וּ <S%H6213><s%> Oh do אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> דְּבַֽר־ <S%H1697><s%> thing הַתֹּעֵבָ֥ה <S%H8441><s%> not this abominable הַזֹּ֖את <S%H2063><s%> likewise אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which שָׂנֵֽאתִי׃ <S%H8130><s%> that I hate

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <S%H8085><s%> But they hearkened וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> or הִטּ֣וּ <S%H5186><s%> not nor inclined אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָזְנָ֔ם <S%H241><s%> their ear לָשׁ֖וּב <S%H7725><s%> to turn מֵרָֽעָתָ֑ם <S%H7451><s%> from their wickedness לְבִלְתִּ֥י <S%H1115><s%> not קַטֵּ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> to burn no incense לֵאלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <S%H312><s%> unto other

וַתִּתַּ֤ךְ <S%H5413><s%> was poured forth חֲמָתִי֙ <S%H2534><s%> Wherefore my fury וְאַפִּ֔י <S%H639><s%> and mine anger וַתִּבְעַר֙ <S%H1197><s%> and was kindled בְּעָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> in the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <S%H2351><s%> and in the streets יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וַתִּהְיֶ֛ינָה <S%H1961><s%> have לְחָרְבָּ֥ה <S%H2723><s%> and they are wasted לִשְׁמָמָ֖ה <S%H8077><s%> [and] desolate כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as at this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> is this ס

וְעַתָּ֡ה <S%H6258><s%> Now כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore now thus saith יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֨י <S%H430><s%> the God צְבָא֜וֹת <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לָמָה֩ <S%H4100><s%> Why אַתֶּ֨ם <S%H859><s%> are you עֹשִׂ֜ים <S%H6213><s%> Wherefore commit רָעָ֤ה <S%H7451><s%> evil גְדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> ye [this] great אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to נַפְשֹׁ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <S%H5315><s%> against your souls לְהַכְרִ֨ית <S%H3772><s%> to cut off לָכֶ֧ם אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> from you man וְאִשָּׁ֛ה <S%H802><s%> and woman עוֹלֵ֥ל <S%H5768><s%> child וְיוֹנֵ֖ק <S%H3243><s%> and suckling מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> out יְהוּדָ֑ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah לְבִלְתִּ֛י <S%H1115><s%> without הוֹתִ֥יר <S%H3498><s%> to leave לָכֶ֖ם שְׁאֵרִֽית׃ <S%H7611><s%> you none to remain

לְהַכְעִסֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H3707><s%> In that ye provoke me unto wrath בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <S%H4639><s%> with the works יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H3027><s%> of your hands לְקַטֵּ֞ר <S%H6999><s%> burning incense לֵאלֹהִ֤ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <S%H312><s%> unto other בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> you בָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> whither ye be gone לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> to dwell שָׁ֑ם <S%H8033><s%> in it לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> so הַכְרִ֣ית <S%H3772><s%> that ye might cut yourselves off לָכֶ֔ם וּלְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> so הֱיֽוֹתְכֶם֙ <S%H1961><s%> and become לִקְלָלָ֣ה <S%H7045><s%> and that ye might be a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּ֔ה <S%H2781><s%> and a reproach בְּכֹ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all גּוֹיֵ֥י <S%H1471><s%> among all the nations הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land

הַֽשְׁכַחְתֶּם֩ <S%H7911><s%> Have ye forgotten אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָע֨וֹת <S%H7451><s%> the wickedness אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֜ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רָע֣וֹת ׀ <S%H7451><s%> and the wickedness מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> רָע֣וֹת <S%H7451><s%> and the wickedness נָשָׁ֔יו <S%H802><s%> of their wives וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> רָעֹ֣תֵכֶ֔ם <S%H7451><s%> and your own wickedness וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> רָעֹ֣ת <S%H7451><s%> and the wickedness נְשֵׁיכֶ֑ם <S%H802><s%> of your wives אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> which עָשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> which they have committed בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְחֻצ֖וֹת <S%H2351><s%> and in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor דֻכְּא֔וּ <S%H1792><s%> They are not humbled עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [even] unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor יָרְא֗וּ <S%H3372><s%> neither have they feared וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor הָלְכ֤וּ <S%H1980><s%> nor walked בְתֽוֹרָתִי֙ <S%H8451><s%> in my law וּבְחֻקֹּתַ֔י <S%H2708><s%> nor in my statutes אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֥תִּי <S%H5414><s%> that I set לִפְנֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H6440><s%> before וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> you and before אֲבוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> your fathers ס

לָכֵ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> Therefore כֹּֽה־ <S%H3541><s%> thus אָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <S%H6635><s%> of hosts אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel הִנְנִ֨י <S%H2005><s%> I am going שָׂ֥ם <S%H7760><s%> Behold I will set פָּנַ֛י <S%H6440><s%> my face בָּכֶ֖ם לְרָעָ֑ה <S%H7451><s%> against you for evil וּלְהַכְרִ֖ית <S%H3772><s%> and to cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> all Judah

וְלָקַחְתִּ֞י <S%H3947><s%> And I will take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> the remnant יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who שָׂ֨מוּ <S%H7760><s%> that have set פְנֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H6440><s%> their faces לָב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> to go אֶֽרֶץ־ <S%H776><s%> into the land מִצְרַיִם֮ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לָג֣וּר <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn שָׁם֒ <S%H8033><s%> there וְתַ֨מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> there and they shall all be consumed כֹ֜ל <S%H3605><s%> will all בְּאֶ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֣יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt יִפֹּ֗לוּ <S%H5307><s%> [and] fall בַּחֶ֤רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בָּֽרָעָב֙ <S%H7458><s%> [and] by the famine יִתַּ֔מּוּ <S%H8552><s%> they shall [even] be consumed מִקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> from the least וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> against גָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> even unto the greatest בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword וּבָרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> and by the famine יָמֻ֑תוּ <S%H4191><s%> they shall die וְהָיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> will become לְאָלָ֣ה <S%H423><s%> and they shall be an execration לְשַׁמָּ֔ה <S%H8047><s%> [and] an astonishment וְלִקְלָלָ֖ה <S%H7045><s%> and a curse וּלְחֶרְפָּֽה׃ <S%H2781><s%> and a reproach

וּפָקַדְתִּ֗י <S%H6485><s%> For I will punish עַ֤ל <S%H5921><s%> and הַיּֽוֹשְׁבִים֙ <S%H3427><s%> them that dwell בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> I פָּקַ֖דְתִּי <S%H6485><s%> as I have punished עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem בַּחֶ֥רֶב <S%H2719><s%> by the sword בָּרָעָ֖ב <S%H7458><s%> by the famine וּבַדָּֽבֶר׃ <S%H1698><s%> and by the pestilence

וְלֹ֨א <S%H3808><s%> will be no יִהְיֶ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become פָּלִ֤יט <S%H6412><s%> there shall escape וְשָׂרִיד֙ <S%H8300><s%> or remain לִשְׁאֵרִ֣ית <S%H7611><s%> So that none of the remnant יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah הַבָּאִ֥ים <S%H935><s%> which are gone לָגֽוּר־ <S%H1481><s%> to sojourn שָׁ֖ם <S%H8033><s%> there בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְלָשׁ֣וּב ׀ <S%H7725><s%> that they should return אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> to which הֵ֜מָּה <S%H1992><s%> they מְנַשְּׂאִ֤ים <S%H5375><s%> to the which they have אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשָׁם֙ <S%H5315><s%> a desire לָשׁוּב֙ <S%H7725><s%> to return לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> there כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> none יָשׁ֖וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> there for none shall return כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo פְּלֵטִֽים׃ <S%H6412><s%> refugees ס
